info.name: Smartsheet Public API 2.0
info.description:
API calls for Smartsheet 2.0 API, as documented here:
http://smartsheet-platform.github.io/api-docs/

item.name: Get an attachment on a sheet

item.name: Add a Row discussions in Sheet
Add predecessor Rows with lag to Sheet
Add an attachment to a row in a sheets

body.raw:
{
  "sendTo": [{"email":"jperez719.test@gmail.com"},{"email":"jperez719.test2@gmail.com"}],
  "subject": "Test Email for this sheet",
  "message": "I am just testing this api email out, this is a row. Just a row",
  "ccMe": true,
  "includeDiscussions":true,
  "includeAttachments":false
}

{
  "sendTo": [{"email":"jperez719.test@gmail.com"},{"email":"jperez719.test2@gmail.com"}],
  "subject": "Test Email for this sheet",
  "message": "Multiple rows",
  "ccMe": false,
  "includeDiscussions":true,
  "includeAttachments":false,
  "rowIds":[6176498886436740,3924699072751492]
}

request.description: Sends sheet as PDF via email

Creates sheet in Sheets folder,
Save as

Gets specific Sheet as Excel/PDF


*excel: application/vnd.ms-excel
(cannont get excel to work)

pdf: application/pdf
for PDF include papersize option
environment Url/sheet/<sheetId>?paperSize=LETTER

csv: text/csv

item.name: Sending an update request from a sheet
Create a Sheet from a sheet

request.description: Import CSV file as new top-level sheet

Retrieves all items in home including reports and templates

*remove "?include=reports,templates" to just see Sheets,folders, workspaces

add loc override by adding ?loc={location}

i.e. 
fr_FR = french
en_EN = spanish

item.name: Get list of users in ORG
Update roles of user in org
Update list of folders in a workspace

request.description:
include parameters:
?include=data,attachments,discussions,cellLinks,forms,brand,shares

skipRemap is for Reports and Cell links, skipping keeps the links to original sheet
?skipRemap=reports,cellLinks

item.name: Create a Workspace from another workspace NEW

request.description:
include parameters:
?include=data,attachments,discussions,cellLinks,forms,brand,shares

skipRemap is for Reports and Cell links, skipping keeps the links to original sheet
?skipRemap=reports,cellLinks
Creates sheet in specified workspace id
